item.description:
Kitty Whist WII and Other Game Night.
The owner of the OT has invited us to use his 2 back rooms for our game night.
I went there and checked it out.
On Thursday night it does not get loud till 9:30 and then it is just karaoke in the front room.
So, bring your games and play till 1:00 am, if you want to.
He has two wii setups with some games like bowling and will let us use our own disks if you want to bring one.
There is a little bar in one of the back rooms no one under 21 can sit at the bar, but you can sit at the tables there.
We can use the bar and 8 of the tables.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have the Kitty Whist game going

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist WII and Other Game Night.
